hero.subtitle: Expert manufacturing of <gold>gold, silver, and palladium</gold> products. <custom>Custom bar fabrication</custom>, uncompromising purity, and <qr>QR-verified authenticity</qr>‚Äîredefining trust in precious metals.

chainOfCustody.label: Chain-of-Custody
chainOfCustody.title: Ledger-locked traceability
chainOfCustody.body: Every gram is recorded with encrypted QR seals and mirrored audit trails.

purityLab.label: Purity Lab
purityLab.title: Spectrometry-backed assurance
purityLab.body: In-house molecular testing calibrates bullion batches to bespoke tolerances.

globalTrust.label: Global Trust
globalTrust.title: ISO 9001
globalTrust.body: Audited facilities, transparent compliance, concierge-level documentation.

qrCard.label: Scan & Verify
qrCard.title: Tap to launch Silver King QR scanner
qrCard.description: Capture the QR seal to view purity & provenance. "Product authenticated" badge appears once functionality is live.

whatWeDo.title: Craft from raw bullion
whatWeDo.description: We transform responsibly sourced gold, silver, and palladium into investment-grade bars using tightly controlled refining and casting lines.

hero.title: Engineering the lifecycle
hero.subtitle: From ore selection and purification to serial coding, QR sealing, and verification, we choreograph each step so every bar carries a verifiable story of origin and custody.

card1.label: Gold fabrication lines
card1.caption: High‚Äëthroughput casting, edge finishing, and surface treatment tuned for bullion batches.

card2.title: Engineer authenticity into every bar
card2.description: Each piece is born with a unique serial, lab-backed purity data, and encrypted QR that ties physical metal to its digital identity.
card2.label: Silver & palladium refinement
card2.caption: Spectrometry‚Äëbacked purification with ISO‚Äëaligned quality controls for industrial and retail bars.

card3.title: Scale verified precious metal flows
card3.description: From mint to vault to client, telemetry and scan events keep partners aligned on provenance, custody, and lifecycle events.
card3.label: Digital verification stack
card3.caption: QR issuance, scan logging, and risk signals wired directly into Silver King Command.

traceable.title: Traceable supply chains
traceable.body: Every Silver King bar carries a verifiable story of origin, custody, and verification events, giving partners confidence in each transfer.

operational.title: Operational clarity
operational.body: Live telemetry from scans turns scattered movements into structured data, helping you see what is moving, where, and through whom.

customer.title: Customer trust at scale
customer.body: A single tap on the QR reveals authenticity, provenance, and product details, building long‚Äëterm trust with collectors and institutions.

compliance.title: Compliance‚Äëready records
compliance.body: Audit‚Äëfriendly logs and standardized identifiers simplify reporting across jurisdictions and support stringent regulatory frameworks.

capabilities.title: Our
capabilities.subtitle: Precision engineering meets uncompromising quality standards

fabrication.title: Gold, Silver & Palladium Fabrication
fabrication.description: High-purity bullion manufacturing from 5gr to 500gr. Expert craftsmanship meeting international standards.

purityLab.title: Advanced Purity Lab
purityLab.description: Spectrometry testing ensuring 99.99% quality. ISO 9001 certified facilities with transparent compliance.

security.title: QR-Authenticated Security
security.description: Each bar integrated with unique, encrypted traceability. Blockchain-ready verification system.

authenticity.title: Authenticity

about.title: About Us
about.description: Learn more about Silver King by CAI.

hero.title: The Legacy
hero.subtitle: Crafting excellence in precious metals since 2024 with uncompromising precision and ground-breaking verification technology.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose
whyChoose.subtitle: Experience the pinnacle of precious metal authentication with a heritage of trust and modern innovation.

authenticity.title: Verified Authenticity
authenticity.description: Each product comes with a unique QR code for instant verification and authenticity confirmation.

quality.title: Premium Quality
quality.description: 99.99% purity guarantee on all our precious metal products, crafted with meticulous attention to detail.

craftsmanship.title: Luxury Craftsmanship
craftsmanship.description: Custom designs and precision manufacturing make every piece a work of art worthy of your collection.

howItWorks.title: Simple. Secure.
howItWorks.subtitle: Three effortless steps to authenticate your investment with confidence.

step1.title: Scan QR Code
step1.description: Simply scan the unique QR code on your product using your smartphone camera.

step2.title: Instant Verification
step2.description: Our system instantly verifies the product's authenticity and displays detailed information.

step3.title: Guaranteed Authentic
step3.description: Receive confirmation that your precious metal is 100% genuine and certified.

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Silver King by CAI represents the pinnacle of precious metal manufacturing. We specialize in creating luxury gold, silver, palladium, and custom silver bars that embody perfection in every detail.
story.paragraph2: Our commitment to excellence is reflected in every product we create. With a purity guarantee of 99.99% on all our precious metals, we ensure that each piece meets the highest standards of quality and craftsmanship.
story.paragraph3: Every Silver King product comes with a unique QR code verification system, allowing our customers to instantly verify the authenticity of their investment. This innovative approach combines traditional craftsmanship with modern technology.

certificate.title: Company
certificate.subtitle: Our commitment to excellence is validated by international quality standards
certificate.certificateName: ISO 9001:2015 Certificate - PT Cahaya Abu Indonesia
certificate.clickToView: Click image to view certificate details

description.title: International Quality Assurance
description.paragraph1: PT Cahaya Abu Indonesia proudly holds ISO 9001:2015 certification, demonstrating our unwavering commitment to quality management systems and operational excellence in precious metals manufacturing.
description.paragraph2: This internationally recognized certification validates our rigorous quality control processes, ensuring that every Silver King product meets the highest standards of purity, precision, and authenticity.
description.paragraph3: Our ISO 9001:2015 certification covers the complete manufacturing process of precious metals, from raw material sourcing to final product verification, providing our customers with confidence in every bar they invest in.

cta.title: Ready to verify
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied customers who trust Silver King for authentic, verified precious metals.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: This page is under construction.
